Name: Textile
Description: A fragment of Coptic textile, consisting of tapestry over indigo wool warp, with slits, built up shapes and curved weft. The motif is very detailed - a running wave border enclosing a green band with plants, butterflies, fish, dolphins and boys seated on crabs. The colours are red, green, white, yellow, pink, <!-->turquoise and indigo. Ends per inch (warp threads): 28.Picks per inch (weft threads): 136.
